verses.verse: And <WG2532> Yeshuw`a entered <WG1525> <WG5631> and passed through <WG1330> <WG5711> Yericho <WG2410>.

And <WG2532>, behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, there was a man <WG435> named <WG3686> <WG2564> <WG5746> Zacchaeus <WG2195>, which <WG2532> <WG846> was <WG2258> <WG5713> the chief among the publicans <WG754>, and <WG2532> he <WG3778> was <WG2258> <WG5713> rich <WG4145>.

And <WG2532> he sought <WG2212> <WG5707> to see <WG1492> <WG5629> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> who <WG5101> he was <WG2076> <WG5748>; and <WG2532> could <WG1410> <WG5711> not <WG3756> for <WG575> the press <WG3793>, because <WG3754> he was <WG2258> <WG5713> little <WG3398> of stature <WG2244>.

And <WG2532> he ran <WG4390> <WG5631> before <WG1715>, and climbed up <WG305> <WG5627> into <WG1909> a sycomore tree <WG4809> to <WG2443> see <WG1492> <WG5632> him <WG846>: for <WG3754> he was <WG3195> <WG5707> to pass <WG1330> <WG5738> <WG1223> that <WG1565> way.

And <WG2532> when <WG5613> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> came <WG2064> <WG5627> to <WG1909> the place <WG5117>, he looked up <WG308> <WG5660>, and saw <WG1492> <WG5627> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto <WG4314> him <WG846>, Zacchaeus <WG2195>, make haste <WG4692> <WG5660>, and come down <WG2597> <WG5628>; for <WG1063> to day <WG4594> I <WG3165> must <WG1163> <WG5748> abide <WG3306> <WG5658> at <WG1722> thy <WG4675> house <WG3624>.
And <WG2532> he made haste <WG4692> <WG5660>, and came down <WG2597> <WG5627>, and <WG2532> received <WG5264> <WG5662> him <WG846> joyfully <WG5463> <WG5723>.

And <WG2532> when they saw <WG1492> <WG5631> it, they <WG1234> all <WG537> murmured <WG1234> <WG5707>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, That <WG3754> he was gone <WG1525> <WG5627> to be guest <WG2647> <WG5658> with <WG3844> a man <WG435> that is a sinner <WG268>.

And <WG1161> Zacchaeus <WG2195> stood <WG2476> <WG5685>, and said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto <WG4314> the YY <WG2962>; Behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, YY <WG2962>, the half <WG2255> of my <WG3450> goods <WG5224> <WG5723> I give <WG1325> <WG5719> to the poor <WG4434>; and <WG2532> if <WG1536> I have taken <WG4811> any thing <WG1536> from any man <WG5100> by false accusation <WG4811> <WG5656>, I restore <WG591> <WG5719> him fourfold <WG5073>.

And <WG1161> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto <WG4314> him <WG846>, <WG3754> This day <WG4594> is <WG1096> salvation <WG4991> come <WG1096> <WG5633> to this <WG5129> house <WG3624>, forsomuch as <WG2530> he <WG846> also <WG2532> is <WG2076> <WG5748> a son <WG5207> of Avraham <WG11>.
For <WG1063> the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> is come <WG2064> <WG5627> to seek <WG2212> <WG5658> and <WG2532> to save <WG4982> <WG5658> that which was lost <WG622> <WG5756>.

And <WG1161> as they <WG846> heard <WG191> <WG5723> these things <WG5023>, he added <WG4369> <WG5631> and spake <WG2036> <WG5627> a parable <WG3850>, because <WG1223> he <WG846> was <WG1511> <WG5750> nigh <WG1451> to Yerushalayim <WG2419>, and <WG2532> because they <WG846> thought <WG1380> <WG5721> that <WG3754> the kingdom <WG932> of 'Elohim <WG2316> should <WG3195> <WG5719> immediately <WG3916> appear <WG398> <WG5745>.

He said <WG2036> <WG5627> therefore <WG3767>, A certain <WG5100> nobleman <WG444> <WG2104> went <WG4198> <WG5675> into <WG1519> a far <WG3117> country <WG5561> to receive <WG2983> <WG5629> for himself <WG1438> a kingdom <WG932>, and <WG2532> to return <WG5290> <WG5658>.

And <WG1161> he called <WG2564> <WG5660> his <WG1438> ten <WG1176> servants <WG1401>, and delivered <WG1325> <WG5656> them <WG846> ten <WG1176> pounds <WG3414>, and <WG2532> said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto <WG4314> them <WG846>, Occupy <WG4231> <WG5663> till <WG2193> I come <WG2064> <WG5736>.

But <WG1161> his <WG846> citizens <WG4177> hated <WG3404> <WG5707> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> sent <WG649> <WG5656> a message <WG4242> after <WG3694> him <WG846>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, We will <WG2309> not <WG3756> have <WG2309> <WG5719> this <WG5126> man to reign <WG936> <WG5658> over <WG1909> us <WG2248>.

And <WG2532> it came to pass <WG1096> <WG5633>, that when <WG1722> he <WG846> was returned <WG1880> <WG5629>, having received <WG2983> <WG5631> the kingdom <WG932>, then <WG2532> he commanded <WG2036> <WG5627> these <WG5128> servants <WG1401> to be called <WG5455> <WG5683> unto him <WG846>, to whom <WG3739> he had given <WG1325> <WG5656> the money <WG694>, that <WG2443> he might know <WG1097> <WG5632> how much <WG5101> every man <WG5101> had gained by trading <WG1281> <WG5662>.
Then <WG1161> came <WG3854> <WG5633> the first <WG4413>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, YY <WG2962>, thy <WG4675> pound <WG3414> hath gained <WG4333> <WG5662> ten <WG1176> pounds <WG3414>.

And <WG2532> he said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto him <WG846>, Well <WG2095>, thou good <WG18> servant <WG1401>: because <WG3754> thou hast been <WG1096> <WG5633> faithful <WG4103> in <WG1722> a very little <WG1646>, have <WG2192> <WG5723> thou authority <WG2468> <WG5749> <WG1849> over <WG1883> ten <WG1176> cities <WG4172>.
And <WG2532> the second <WG1208> came <WG2064> <WG5627>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, YY <WG2962>, thy <WG4675> pound <WG3414> hath gained <WG4160> <WG5656> five <WG4002> pounds <WG3414>.
And <WG1161> he said <WG2036> <WG5627> likewise <WG2532> to him <WG5129>, Be <WG1096> <WG5737> thou <WG4771> also <WG2532> over <WG1883> five <WG4002> cities <WG4172>.

And <WG2532> another <WG2087> came <WG2064> <WG5627>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, YY <WG2962>, behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, here is thy <WG4675> pound <WG3414>, which <WG3739> I have <WG2192> <WG5707> kept laid up <WG606> <WG5740> in <WG1722> a napkin <WG4676>:

For <WG1063> I feared <WG5399> <WG5711> thee <WG4571>, because <WG3754> thou art <WG1488> <WG5748> an austere <WG840> man <WG444>: thou takest up <WG142> <WG5719> that <WG3739> thou layedst <WG5087> not <WG3756> down <WG5087> <WG5656>, and <WG2532> reapest <WG2325> <WG5719> that <WG3739> thou didst <WG4687> not <WG3756> sow <WG4687> <WG5656>.

And <WG1161> he saith <WG3004> <WG5719> unto him <WG846>, Out of <WG1537> thine own <WG4675> mouth <WG4750> will I judge <WG2919> <WG5692> thee <WG4571>, thou wicked <WG4190> servant <WG1401>. Thou knewest <WG1492> <WG5715> that <WG3754> I <WG1473> was <WG1510> <WG5748> an austere <WG840> man <WG444>, taking up <WG142> <WG5723> that <WG3739> I laid <WG5087> not <WG3756> down <WG5087> <WG5656>, and <WG2532> reaping <WG2325> <WG5723> that <WG3739> I did <WG4687> not <WG3756> sow <WG4687> <WG5656>:

Wherefore <WG1302> then <WG2532> gavest <WG1325> not <WG3756> thou <WG1325> <WG5656> my <WG3450> money <WG694> into <WG1909> the bank <WG5132>, that <WG2532> at my coming <WG2064> <WG5631> I <WG1473> might <WG302> have required <WG4238> <WG5656> mine own <WG846> with <WG4862> usury <WG5110>?

And <WG2532> he said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto them that stood by <WG3936> <WG5761>, Take <WG142> <WG5657> from <WG575> him <WG846> the pound <WG3414>, and <WG2532> give <WG1325> <WG5628> it to him that hath <WG2192> <WG5723> ten <WG1176> pounds <WG3414>.
(And <WG2532> they said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto him <WG846>, YY <WG2962>, he hath <WG2192> <WG5719> ten <WG1176> pounds <WG3414>.)

For <WG1063> I say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213>, That <WG3754> unto every one <WG3956> which <WG3588> hath <WG2192> <WG5723> shall be given <WG1325> <WG5701>; and <WG1161> from <WG575> him that hath <WG2192> <WG5723> not <WG3361>, even <WG2532> that <WG3739> he hath <WG2192> <WG5719> shall be taken away <WG142> <WG5701> from <WG575> him <WG846>.

But <WG4133> those <WG1565> mine <WG3450> enemies <WG2190>, which <WG3588> would <WG2309> <WG5660> not <WG3361> that I <WG3165> should reign <WG936> <WG5658> over <WG1909> them <WG846>, bring <WG71> <WG5628> hither <WG5602>, and <WG2532> slay <WG2695> <WG5657> them before <WG1715> me <WG3450>.
And <WG2532> when he had thus <WG5023> spoken <WG2036> <WG5631>, he went <WG4198> <WG5711> before <WG1715>, ascending up <WG305> <WG5723> to <WG1519> Yerushalayim <WG2414>.

And <WG2532> it came to pass <WG1096> <WG5633>, when <WG5613> he was come nigh <WG1448> <WG5656> to <WG1519> Beit-Pagei <WG967> and <WG2532> Beit-Anyah <WG963>, at <WG4314> the mount <WG3735> called <WG2564> <WG5746> the mount of Olives <WG1636>, he sent <WG649> <WG5656> two <WG1417> of his <WG846> Talmidim <WG3101>,

Saying <WG2036> <WG5631>, Go ye <WG5217> <WG5720> into <WG1519> the village <WG2968> over against <WG2713> you; in <WG1722> the which <WG3739> at your entering <WG1531> <WG5740> ye shall find <WG2147> <WG5692> a colt <WG4454> tied <WG1210> <WG5772>, whereon <WG1909> <WG3739> yet never <WG3762> man <WG444> sat <WG2523> <WG5656> <WG4455>: loose <WG3089> <WG5660> him <WG846>, and bring <WG71> <WG5628> him hither.

And <WG2532> if <WG1437> any man <WG5100> ask <WG2065> <WG5725> you <WG5209>, Why <WG1302> do ye loose <WG3089> <WG5719> him? thus <WG3779> shall ye say <WG2046> <WG5692> unto him <WG846>, Because <WG3754> the YY <WG2962> hath <WG2192> <WG5719> need <WG5532> of him <WG846>.
And <WG1161> they that were sent <WG649> <WG5772> went their way <WG565> <WG5631>, and found <WG2147> <WG5627> even as <WG2531> he had said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto them <WG846>.

And <WG1161> as they <WG846> were loosing <WG3089> <WG5723> the colt <WG4454>, the owners <WG2962> thereof <WG846> said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto <WG4314> them <WG846>, Why <WG5101> loose ye <WG3089> <WG5719> the colt <WG4454>?
And <WG1161> they said <WG2036> <WG5627>, The YY <WG2962> hath <WG2192> <WG5719> need <WG5532> of him <WG846>.

And <WG2532> they brought <WG71> <WG5627> him <WG846> to <WG4314> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>: and <WG2532> they cast <WG1977> their <WG1438> garments <WG2440> upon <WG1909> <WG1977> the colt <WG4454>, and <WG1977> <WG5660> they set <WG1913> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> thereon <WG1913> <WG5656>.
And <WG1161> as he <WG846> went <WG4198> <WG5740>, they spread <WG5291> <WG5707> their <WG846> clothes <WG2440> in <WG1722> the way <WG3598>.

And when he <WG846> was come nigh <WG1448> <WG5723>, even <WG1161> now <WG2235> at <WG4314> the descent <WG2600> of the mount <WG3735> of Olives <WG1636>, the whole <WG537> multitude <WG4128> of the Talmidim <WG3101> began <WG756> <WG5662> to rejoice <WG5463> <WG5723> and praise <WG134> <WG5721> 'Elohim <WG2316> with a loud <WG3173> voice <WG5456> for <WG4012> all <WG3956> the mighty works <WG1411> that <WG3739> they had seen <WG1492> <WG5627>;

Saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, Blessed <WG2127> <WG5772> be the King <WG935> that cometh <WG2064> <WG5740> in <WG1722> the name <WG3686> of the YY <WG2962>: peace <WG1515> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>, and <WG2532> glory <WG1391> in <WG1722> the highest <WG5310>.

And <WG2532> some <WG5100> of the P'rushim <WG5330> from <WG575> among the multitude <WG3793> said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto <WG4314> him <WG846>, Master <WG1320>, rebuke <WG2008> <WG5657> thy <WG4675> Talmidim <WG3101>.

And <WG2532> he answered <WG611> <WG5679> and said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto them <WG846>, I tell <WG3004> <WG5719> you <WG5213> that <WG3754>, if <WG1437> these <WG3778> should hold their peace <WG4623> <WG5661>, the stones <WG3037> would immediately cry out <WG2896> <WG5688>.
And <WG2532> when <WG5613> he was come near <WG1448> <WG5656>, he beheld <WG1492> <WG5631> the city <WG4172>, and wept <WG2799> <WG5656> over <WG1909> it <WG846>,

Saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, If <WG3754> <WG1487> thou hadst known <WG1097> <WG5627>, even <WG2532> thou <WG4771>, at least <WG2534> in <WG1722> this <WG5026> thy <WG4675> day <WG2250>, the things <WG3588> which belong unto <WG4314> thy <WG4675> peace <WG1515>! but <WG1161> now <WG3568> they are hid <WG2928> <WG5648> from <WG575> thine <WG4675> eyes <WG3788>.

For <WG3754> the days <WG2250> shall come <WG2240> <WG5692> upon <WG1909> thee <WG4571>, that <WG2532> thine <WG4675> enemies <WG2190> shall cast <WG4016> a trench <WG5482> about <WG4016> <WG5692> thee <WG4671>, and <WG2532> compass <WG4033> thee <WG4571> round <WG4033> <WG5692>, and <WG2532> keep <WG4912> thee <WG4571> in <WG4912> <WG5692> on every side <WG3840>,

And <WG2532> shall lay <WG1474> thee <WG4571> even with the ground <WG1474> <WG5692>, and <WG2532> thy <WG4675> children <WG5043> within <WG1722> thee <WG4671>; and <WG2532> they shall <WG863> not <WG3756> leave <WG863> <WG5692> in <WG1722> thee <WG4671> one stone <WG3037> upon <WG1909> another <WG3037>; because <WG473> <WG3739> thou knewest <WG1097> <WG5627> not <WG3756> the time <WG2540> of thy <WG4675> visitation <WG1984>.

And <WG2532> he went <WG1525> <WG5631> into <WG1519> the temple <WG2411>, and began <WG756> <WG5662> to cast out <WG1544> <WG5721> them that sold <WG4453> <WG5723> therein <WG1722> <WG846>, and <WG2532> them that bought <WG59> <WG5723>;

Saying <WG3004> <WG5723> unto them <WG846>, It is written <WG1125> <WG5769>, My <WG3450> house <WG3624> is <WG2076> <WG5748> the house <WG3624> of prayer <WG4335>: but <WG1161> ye <WG5210> have made <WG4160> <WG5656> it <WG846> a den <WG4693> of thieves <WG3027>.

And <WG2532> he taught <WG2258> <WG5713> <WG1321> <WG5723> daily <WG2596> <WG2250> in <WG1722> the temple <WG2411>. But <WG1161> the chief Kohanim <WG749> and <WG2532> the scribes <WG1122> and <WG2532> the chief <WG4413> of the people <WG2992> sought <WG2212> <WG5707> to destroy <WG622> <WG5658> him <WG846>,

And <WG2532> could <WG2147> not <WG3756> find <WG2147> <WG5707> what <WG5101> they might do <WG4160> <WG5661>: for <WG1063> all <WG537> the people <WG2992> were very attentive <WG1582> <WG5710> to hear <WG191> <WG5723> him <WG846>.
